song_lyrics: Amar vāraso Guṇātītthī, satat chālato Shrī Hari taṇo,
Bhagatjī ane Shāstrījī vaḷī, viral Yogījī Shrī Pramukhthī. 1
Tvamevāsi Shāstrī cha Yogī swayam hi
Saralam suhṛudam pavitam manasā, lalitam madhuram sūnṛutam vachasā |
Nipuṇam sudraḍham susaham kriyayā, praṇamāmi gurum Pramukham guṇinam || 3
Dhīre dhīre vadhī re, guru tuj mahimā,
Sīre sīre ghasī re, tav padraj sau,
Kīre kīre ṭakī re, tav guṇ gaṇ nai,
Hīre hīre nahi re, Pramukhjī tamne,
title: Amar vāraso Guṇātītthī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-4021: unknown

Category: Vadharana Ashtako
